data.name: Rev to Vertex
data.detailed_description:
A new racing sim is about to mark new territory. The new racing sim is titled “Rev to Vertex” (R2V). Developed by “Plutonization,” a small development team led by Gran Prix racer in Hong Kong. R2V is a new racing game set in the unexplored hills and streets of Hong Kong.

R2V, unlike any rally or racing circuit game, you don’t win by crossing a finish line. Instead, you engage in togue battle rivalling street racers on the fly. Speed through hill climbs and street tags. Distance yourself until your tail light vanishes from your opponent to claim victory. R2V’s vast collection of cars and the ability for players to fully mod and customize their vehicles. You will always ride with style and finesse.

The game brings reality into your monitors by taking geospatial data of the road as the most accurate reference, tracing every spec of reality and creating the racing tracks simulating our world. The game explores to give racing fans fresh and exciting tracks. R2V’s maps are currently set in Hong Kong at release and expand across the ocean on future updates.
